attributes.action: ensure that the DVLA can access it's own databases from their offices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am not allowed to tax my new (to me) car.
This is because I have the insurance certificate at home, and the garage has the other bits of documentation.

The DVLA office won't accept anything other than the original certificate, which I can't get there in time.

They should be able to access the MOT and Insurance databases, so that ANYONE can buy tax for ANY car - with or without documentation.

There is no valid reason for preventing someone from buying tax when the above pieces of information are already available to the DVLA.
